weekly_top_story.headline: President Trump Issues Warning to Hamas Amid Fragile Gaza Ceasefire
weekly_top_story.summary: President Trump has issued a stern warning to Hamas, demanding disarmament amidst a fragile ceasefire in Gaza, which underscores the ongoing tensions in the region and global efforts to stabilize it.

stories.headline: All Israeli Hostages Freed, Palestinian Prisoners Released Under Ceasefire Deal
stories.summary: A new ceasefire deal has led to the release of all Israeli hostages and Palestinian prisoners, marking a significant development in the conflict between Israel and Palestine.

stories.headline: Madagascar's President Rajoelina Flees Amid Protests, Dissolves Parliament
stories.summary: Madagascan President Andry Rajoelina has fled the country and dissolved parliament following intense protests, deepening the political crisis.
